about_the_game:
"Electronic Market Simulator Prologue" is a cold-blooded first-person simulation that covers every detail of running an Electronic Market.

STORE MANAGEMENT

Design your store to be beautiful and efficient. Determine where products will be displayed, manage your shelves and provide a perfect shopping experience by increasing customer satisfaction.

SUPPLY GOODS

Order items using the in-game computer. Place the products in your store as you wish and offer them to your customers.

CASHİER

Move items through registers and collect payments by cash or credit card. Hire extra cashiers to increase customer satisfaction.

GROW

Earn money, level up and expand your store. Then increase your earnings by renting new stores.

Electronic Market Simulator Prologue includes;

  • Purchase and sale of restricted items

  • Restricted shelf purchases

  • Fixed decoration score

  • 2 credit limits

  • limited map

  • limited customers

  • Calm and empty city life

  • Cash transactions only

This content is the prologue version of the Electronic Market Simulator game. Many features are not fully presented.

Customer satisfaction and price policy are very important to be successful in the "Electronic Market Simulator" game. Will you be able to win this race to get to the top of the city by making the right decisions and increasing the number of stores?

name: Electronic Market Simulator: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-6600 / AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8600K / AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Electronic Market Simulator Prologue is a pre-release simulation game in which players manage and operate their own electronics stores. Players sell products and aim to be the best store. Strategic decisions are required regarding store management and finance.
supported_languages: English, French, Turkish, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
